```{r setup, echo=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemr)
ggthemr("earth")
```

```{r prep-data}
x <- 1:11
y <- (1.5:11.5)^2
low <- (0:10)^2
upp <- (3:13)^2
```

```{r ribbon}
ggplot() +
  aes(x, y) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = low, ymax = upp), alpha = 0.5)
```

```{r }
x2 <- c(1:8, NA, NA, NA)
ggplot() +
  aes(x, y) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_ribbon(aes(x = x2, ymin = low, ymax = upp), alpha = 0.5)
```

```{r gaussian}
x <- seq(-4, 4, by = 0.05)
y <- dnorm(x)
```

```{r density}
p <- ggplot() +
  aes(x, y) +
  geom_line()
p
```

```{r density-area}
p +
  geom_ribbon(
    aes(x = ifelse(x <= -1 , x, NA), ymin = 0, ymax = y),
    fill = "#E84646",
    alpha = 0.4
  )
```
